original_text: Hezekiah received the envoys and showed them all that was in his storehouses—the silver, the gold, the spices and the fine olive oil—his armory and everything found among his treasures. There was nothing in his palace or in all his kingdom that Hezekiah did not show them.
korean_text: 히스기야가 사자들의 말을 듣고 자기 보물고의 금은과 향품과 보배로운 기름과 그의 군기고와 창고의 모든 것을 다 사자들에게 보였는데 왕궁과 그의 나라 안에 있는 모든 것 중에서 히스기야가 그에게 보이지 아니한 것이 없더라

sentences.original_text: and showed them all that was in his storehouses
sentences.korean_translation: 그의 창고에 있는 모든 것을 그들에게 보여주었다

sentences.original_text: the spices and the fine olive oil
and everything found among his treasures
sentences.korean_translation: 그의 보물들 중에서 발견된 모든 것을

sentences.original_text: There was nothing in his palace
that Hezekiah did not show them
